      SoloGameController​(java.util.ArrayList<ClientHandler> clients)

      Persistence only - recreate a SoloGameController from the match saved in memory

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      protected void checkLastTurn​(Player player)
      Checks if the Player more than 7 development cards or has reached the end of the track and triggers the round to be the last First it checks the losing conditions: if all the cards of a certain color where discarded (using the last_card_discarded variable) if the Black Cross reached the end of the FaithTrack If either one of these conditions are true, the Player lost the game Then it checks the winning conditions: if a Player has bought at least 7 DevelopmentCards if the Player reached the end of the FaithTrack If either one of these conditions are true, the Player won If none of these apply, the game continues normally, otherwise the game will end
      void discardDevelopmentCards​(DevelopmentCardsColor color)
      Called by the SoloActionToken using the Visitor pattern, discard two DevelopmentCards of a specific DevelopmentCardsColor
      private void discardOneCard​(int order)
      Discard a card of the DevelopmentCardsOnTable of a color starting from the lowest level
      private void handleBlackMarkerVaticanReports​(VaticanReports report)
      If a VaticanReports was activated by the Black Cross, activate it on the Player
      void handleDiscardResources​(Player player)
      Upon receiving the corresponding message, checks if the player who requested the action is active and if they already paid every cost, Discards all the remaining resources from the turn state and moves forward the Black Cross if conditions are met, raises corresponding error otherwise.
      void handleEndTurn​(Player player)
      Upon receiving the corresponding message, checks if the player who requested the action is active, if they have played a main action, if they paid the cost of their action completely and completely stored all of their gain.
      void handlePersistence​(Player player)
      Upon receiving the corresponding message, save the current state of the match in an appropriate json file
      void moveBlackCrossOneSpace()
      Called by the SoloActionToken using the Visitor pattern, move the Black Cross one space forward and shuffle the Queue of SoloActionTokens
      void moveBlackCrossTwoSpaces()
      Called by the SoloActionToken using the Visitor pattern, move the Black Cross two spaces forward
      void setupGame()
      Setup the SoloGame using the SetupManager
      boolean wasLastCardDiscarded()

      • wasLastCardDiscarded

        public boolean wasLastCardDiscarded()

      • checkLastTurn

        protected void checkLastTurn​(Player player)
        Checks if the Player more than 7 development cards or has reached the end of the track and triggers the round to be the last First it checks the losing conditions: if all the cards of a certain color where discarded (using the last_card_discarded variable) if the Black Cross reached the end of the FaithTrack If either one of these conditions are true, the Player lost the game Then it checks the winning conditions: if a Player has bought at least 7 DevelopmentCards if the Player reached the end of the FaithTrack If either one of these conditions are true, the Player won If none of these apply, the game continues normally, otherwise the game will end
        Overrides:
        checkLastTurn in class GameController
        Parameters:
        player - is the active Player

      • handleEndTurn

        public void handleEndTurn​(Player player)
        Upon receiving the corresponding message, checks if the player who requested the action is active, if they have played a main action, if they paid the cost of their action completely and completely stored all of their gain. Get the SoloActionToken on top of the stack and apply its function End the turn and starts the next player's turn if conditions are met, triggering the last round if needed, raises corresponding error otherwise.
        Specified by:
        handleEndTurn in interface Controller
        Overrides:
        handleEndTurn in class GameController
        Parameters:
        player - is the Player who requested the action

      • handleDiscardResources

        public void handleDiscardResources​(Player player)
        Upon receiving the corresponding message, checks if the player who requested the action is active and if they already paid every cost, Discards all the remaining resources from the turn state and moves forward the Black Cross if conditions are met, raises corresponding error otherwise.
        Specified by:
        handleDiscardResources in interface Controller
        Overrides:
        handleDiscardResources in class GameController
        Parameters:
        player - is the player who requested the action

        private void handleBlackMarkerVaticanReports​(VaticanReports report)
        If a VaticanReports was activated by the Black Cross, activate it on the Player
        Parameters:
        report - the VaticanReport activated
